architectural_resources: Kubernetes Deployment (apps/v1) running 1 replica of the container
Kubernetes Service of type LoadBalancer exposing port 3000 (implies cloud load balancer on many managed K8s platforms)
External third-party API dependency: https://official-joke-api.appspot.com/random_joke (used via fetch in /src/components/Joke.js)
CI/CD resources: Jenkins (pipeline uses SonarQube, OWASP Dependency-Check, Trivy, Docker Scout, DockerHub push) and GitHub Actions (Node CI + npm publish)
Container registry: DockerHub (image yash5090/react-jg-app:latest referenced in /deployment.yaml and pushed in /Jenkinsfile)
